H0.text: What special name is given to Tibetan monks. Bhikkhus

H1.text: What special name is given to Tibetan monks. Geshes

H2.text: What special name is given to Tibetan monks. Tulku

H3.text: What special name is given to Tibetan monks. Lamas

A4.text: In Tibet, Tibetan lamas had four main types of lifestyles: those who were monks, living in monasteries.
